languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное донесение! Баржи с десятиной перехвачены и отбывают в неизвестном направлении. Флагману воксируют несколько источников с планеты одновременно — я различаю сигнатуры дворянских домов и Администратума".

"Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное донесение! Баржи с десятиной перехвачены и отбывают в неизвестном направлении. Флагману воксируют несколько источников с планеты одновременно — я различаю сигнатуры дворянских домов и Администратума".

"Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."

languages.text: "Dringender Bericht, Lord Captain! Die Lastschiffe mit dem Zehnt wurden überfallen und sind mit unbekanntem Kurs unterwegs. Mehrere Quellen wollen gleichzeitig mit dem Flaggschiff Kontakt aufnehmen. Ich orte die Signaturen mehrerer Adelshäuser und des Administratums."
languages.original_text: "Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Dringender Bericht, Lord Captain! Die Lastschiffe mit dem Zehnt wurden überfallen und sind mit unbekanntem Kurs unterwegs. Mehrere Quellen wollen gleichzeitig mit dem Flaggschiff Kontakt aufnehmen. Ich orte die Signaturen mehrerer Adelshäuser und des Administratums."

languages.text: « Voici un rapport urgent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Les barges transportant la dîme ont été interceptées et se dirigent vers une destination inconnue. Plusieurs sources essaient de communiquer avec le navire amiral. Je détecte les signatures de plusieurs nobles maisons et de l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: « Voici un rapport urgent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Les barges transportant la dîme ont été interceptées et se dirigent vers une destination inconnue. Plusieurs sources essaient de communiquer avec le navire amiral. Je détecte les signatures de plusieurs nobles maisons et de l'Administratum. »

languages.text: “紧急报告，舰长大人！负责运输什一税的货船遭到了扣押，目前正在前往未知方向。旗舰收到了大量音阵信息，其中一部分信息带有贵族家族的签名，另外一部分来自帝国内政部。”
languages.original_text: "Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: “紧急报告，舰长大人！负责运输什一税的货船遭到了扣押，目前正在前往未知方向。旗舰收到了大量音阵信息，其中一部分信息带有贵族家族的签名，另外一部分来自帝国内政部。”

languages.text: «¡Informe urgente, Lord Capitán! Las naves que transportan el diezmo han sido capturadas y se alejan en dirección desconocida. Tenemos varias fuentes contactando con los vocos de la nave insignia. Detecto la señales de casas nobles y del Administratum».
languages.original_text: "Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: «¡Informe urgente, Lord Capitán! Las naves que transportan el diezmo han sido capturadas y se alejan en dirección desconocida. Tenemos varias fuentes contactando con los vocos de la nave insignia. Detecto la señales de casas nobles y del Administratum».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！緊急報告です。租税を運んでいた荷船が奪取され、不明な方向へ向かっています。複数の発信元が旗艦にヴォクス通信を送っており、いくつかの貴族と帝国行政局の署名が確認されています」
languages.original_text: "Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！緊急報告です。租税を運んでいた荷船が奪取され、不明な方向へ向かっています。複数の発信元が旗艦にヴォクス通信を送っており、いくつかの貴族と帝国行政局の署名が確認されています」

languages.text: "Acil rapor Lord Kaptan! Aşar taşıyan mavnalar ele geçirildi ve bilinmeyen bir yöne doğru ilerliyor. Birden fazla kaynak aynı anda sancak gemisine voks sinyali gönderiyor. Birkaç soylu haneye ve Administratum'a ait imzaları tespit ettim."
languages.original_text: "Urgent report, Lord Captain! The barges carrying the tithe have been seized and are heading off in an unknown direction. Multiple sources are voxing the flagship at once. I detect the signatures of several noble houses and the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Acil rapor Lord Kaptan! Aşar taşıyan mavnalar ele geçirildi ve bilinmeyen bir yöne doğru ilerliyor. Birden fazla kaynak aynı anda sancak gemisine voks sinyali gönderiyor. Birkaç soylu haneye ve Administratum'a ait imzaları tespit ettim."
